transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hi Kriti mam Manish baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm hmm bataiye.
Executive: Sujata mam I think available nahi thi na unhone bola ki aapse ek baar connect karne ke liye.
Customer: To overall meeting ho sakti hai kya aaj ke sath?
Executive: Oh meeting meeting sir aap kal hi kar lena aur sare aa jayenge usme.
Customer: Achcha. Okay. Available hai aap aaj apne conduction vagaira kiya kaisa kya aaj ka update raha IndiaMART ke end se?
Customer: Aaj to leads bhi nahi aayi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hmm. Ek second ruko.
Executive: Aaj aapne around char lead purchase kari hai ek Shailesh Nimesh Kumar Jugla Manoj and.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Kya response raha inke aaj?
Customer: Actually ye mere number nahi hai to main aapko puch ke bata dungi. Kya discussion hai.
Executive: Aisa bhi hota hai kya ki matlab aap aapka number nahi hota to aap nahi karte aise?
Customer: Jo ab jaise isme 97 ke naam se ek number hai na ye lead usne purchase kiya hai to ye wahi discuss karega. Agar mera number hoga ye wala jispe abhi discussion ho rahi hai aapki meri to main discussion karungi usse. Hmm.
Executive: Achcha aisa bhi hai kya matlab koi bhi matlab jaise suppose koi lead ke baad matlab aapki team me koi decide karta hai ki kaun kiska karega?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo kaun decide karta hai wo Sujata mam karte hai kaun karta hai?
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: Wo cheez kaun decide karta hai ki isme ye call karega isme ye call karega?
Customer: Uh jo leads jaise ab maine koi lead purchase ki hai mujhe dikhi hai ki ye lead maine purchase ki hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Hello.
Customer: To usko discuss main hi karungi aur koi nahi karega. Okay to ye to ye lead dusra purchase kiya hai Sujata ne lead purchase ki hai to wo unse wo discuss karenge unse. Haan revert inka main aapko bata sakti hu kya revert hai main puch ke aapko bata dungi.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek cheez aur reverts na aap reverts jaise ki aap to sheet me bhi maintain kar sakte hai baki remarks ka aur lead manager me bhi option aata hai aapke paas.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai waha pe bhi aap remarks dal sakte hai kisi bhi team ka koi bhi leads ka.
Customer: Koi nahi wo to jab meeting hogi aap ek baar discussion kar lena unke sath sab jo baithenge jo jo leads purchase karna hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm. Lead kaun purchase karta hai matlab isme se lead?
Executive: Ek particular ek person purchase nahi karta jiske paas jo jaise hum four persons hai four three person jo bhi hai. Theek hai unke paas IndiaMART ka access hai to unke paas lead aayi hai to wo purchase kar lete hai jisko dikhe wo kar leta hai purchase aise hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Jaise ki isme se teen log hai jaise ki ek uh Vikas sir to owner hai company ke.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to iske alawa ek aur sir hai jaise ki jinka number hai 9518008 ye kya dekhte hai?
Customer: Ek second ruko. Number batana.
Executive: 951814008
Customer: 95 181 ye to owner hai na Kushal sir.
Executive: Achcha ye bhi owner hai. Hmm. Okay. Isme se ek Vidya karke hai Vidya kaun hai?
Customer: Oh ye export ka dekhte hai.
Executive: Okay. Okay. Ek isi me GSM karke ek number hai 70159668458 ye abhi ye bhi lead purchase nahi kar rahe kyuki ye bhi sale kar nahi rahe na aur.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur ye kin ka number hai 981294002?
Customer: Ek minute. 98129400 ye to Vikas sir hai.
Executive: Achcha. Hmm.
Executive: Okay. To kal ek baar na ek baar main aapko yahi suggest karunga kal ek baar na jo bhi lead purchase karta hai theek hai aur jo bhi aapki team hai sari team aayiyega ek baar sath me.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai matlab last aap kab se dekh rahe hai IndiaMART vaise aapke level pe aap kab kab se dekh rahe hai IndiaMART yaha par?
Customer: Main to pichle ek saal se.
Executive: Pichle ek saal se to pichle ek saal se kya response raha matlab kuch bhi IndiaMART se nahi aata hai?
Customer: IndiaMART ka response hai hi nahi. Bilkul hi nahi hai. Ye jo leads milti hai na Facebook ke through aati hai mere paas. IndiaMART to zero aa raha hai mere paas. Mere paas kya sabke paas hi zero aa raha hai main.
Executive: Month on month matlab pehle ye sahi aata tha ye kab se aisa aa raha hai ki kab se aisa nahi aa raha ki bilkul hi nahi bilkul hi kam ho gaya hai?
Customer: Nahi mere paas to dekho jab se main aayi tab se aa raha hai. Baki matlab bhai ek saal se ek saal se kuch aa hi nahi raha.
Executive: Mere paas to dekho aaya nahi. Hmm. Hmm. Baki aur baki team se koi bhi sales kuch bhi sales nahi hoti hai?
Customer: Wo karte hai alag alag platform hai sabke IndiaMART se revert nahi aa raha to koi aur platform to dekhna padega na.
Executive: Nahi IndiaMART theek hai IndiaMART agar suppose aap do teen log use karte hai to do teen log dono me se kisi me se kisi bhi sale nahi aa rahi hai IndiaMART se. Ya hum chota mota sale bhi nahi nikal pate IndiaMART se bilkul zero ja raha hai.
Customer: Nahi yaar unke paas bhi nahi aa rahi hogi tabhi Sujata ke paas bhi nahi aa rahi hogi tabhi to itne reverts kar rahi hai. Aapko message bhi karte hai group me. Bas aapke end se koi response aata hi nahi. Bas aap feedback mangte hai feedback ke baad kuch hota hi nahi hai.
Executive: Dekhiye feedback ke liye agar almost dekha jaye to around month on month aapke end se lead conduction ho rahi hai almost yaha pe hum log March April May June me char char so lead purchase karte the. So not a single lead converted to aisa to nahi ho sakta hai.
Customer: To aap ek baar khud call karke dekhna aapko bhi pata chal jayega kya response hai.
Executive: Nahi hum log kar rahe hai call kuch kuch me response dikha hai ki hume kuch kuch me call logo ne di hai. Theek hai. To kis tarike se theek hai to ek baar na kal ek baar na jo bhi number batao na. Already dekhiye sheet agar aapke paas hai na to sheet me hum log add kar rahe hai daily basis pe jo bhi aapki lead purchase ho rahi hai. Theek hai ek baar jo aaj char buy lead purchase hui hai unka bhi aap ek baar update dijiyega theek hai baat karke. Theek hai is tarike se daily basis pe hum karenge update.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai dekhte hai kyuki almost itni sari leads me aapko hum nahi keh rahe ki 90% me at least 10% to aayega na.
Customer: Chalo 10% bhi aayega to jo aap call kar rahe ho usme mujhe number bata do main usse dekh lungi kya kehta hai wo agar wo bhi 10% galat nikli to to fir hum hum bhi kuch nahi kar sakte na.
Executive: Hmm. Theek hai wahi cheez wahi cheez hum log dekhna chah rahe hai to kal ek baar Sujata mam aur sab milke ek baar meeting karte hai theek hai hamare bhi senior aayenge to ek baar dekhte hai baat karte hai kya kaisa hota hai. Theek hai. Hmm theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads or sales from IndiaMART in a year.

- Wants to know who is responsible for leads.

- Wants numbers of leads called by the executive.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead distribution process.

- Executive will check lead conduction.

- Meeting scheduled with senior members.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting to be held with senior members.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, sales, meeting, team
